snippet: A Chinese court sentenced 10 employees of the OSI Group, which supplies McDonald’s and Yum Brands in China, to prison and fined the company over claims that it reused returned food products to avoid losses.
abstract: Chinese court sentences 10 employees at American food supplier OSI Goup to prison, fining company up to 2.4 million renminbi, or $364,875; sentences stem from claims that company reused returned food products to dodge losses; firm supplies McDonald's and Yum Brands.
lead_paragraph: A Chinese court sentenced 10 employees of the OSI Group, which supplies McDonald’s and Yum Brands in China, to prison and fined the company over claims that it reused returned food products to avoid losses.

headline.main: Jail Terms and Fines for Supplier to McDonald’s and Yum Brands in China
headline.print_headline: Jail Terms and Fines for Supplier to McDonald’s and Yum Brands in China
